about_the_game:
About "DAUGHTER OF PAIN"

"DAUGHTER OF PAIN" is a top-down action game with Roguelike elements independently developed by "Yu Bu Yun Tian". In the game, you will explore dreams, discover strange treasures, and grow on the path of artistic creation... Of course, that is on the premise that you can defeat the powerful enemies who are the incarnations of pain. Don't be afraid of nightmares - slumber, awaken, create, and the cycle repeats.

"Engaging in a tussle with pain, one will also be tainted by pain."

The girl who is called "DAUGHTER OF PAIN" by netizens draws inspiration from the nightmares of fighting against the "incarnations of pain". She paints the painful experiences submitted by netizens into one painting after another, showing the stories hidden in the shadows. The girl herself is also gradually awakening the memories that were once lost in the cycle of "fighting against pain" and "painting pain".

"Is awakening the end of nightmares? No, the moment of waking up from the dream is precisely the beginning of everything..."

Search for the dream flower and find a way out in the complex and ever-changing combinations of rooms; obtain treasures and defeat various powerful enemies with wisdom; select pigments to shape a powerful and unique self. Will you overcome all obstacles and sleep until you wake up naturally? Or will you be awakened by nightmares and have to start all over again? Don't be afraid. Even if you fail, there are still many precious things that can be left for you. Powerful props, novel costumes, and even the ability to transform into 全新的形态 (I'm not sure what the specific Chinese phrase means here precisely. If it means "new forms", then it can be translated as "new forms" in English). These brilliant ideas that flash through your mind will all become reality through the paintbrush, making you more than capable of handling difficult situations.

Game Features:

  • Randomly generated combinations of rooms, various enemies, and bosses ensure that you will never have a repetitive gaming experience.

  • Over 100 items with unique effects.

  • Over 50 freely combinable clothing accessories.

  • Over 50 different types of enemies.

  • Over 20 bosses with their own characteristics.

  • Over 20 freely transformable forms.

  • 4 complete game chapters and 5 game difficulty levels.

  • Multiple game endings.

content_descriptors.notes:
【Religious Metaphors and Symbols】
Some settings, items, and the story background in the game contain rather profound religious metaphors. These metaphors may involve classic religious stories. I only hope to enrich the cultural connotations and story depths of the game through these elements. However, players are also requested to understand and approach the religious content therein with an open and rational attitude during the gaming experience to avoid unnecessary misunderstandings and conflicts.

【Violent and Gory Scenes】
There are certain violent and gory scenes in the game, such as the special effects of character injuries and deaths during battles, and the designs of some monsters or scenes will present pictures of blood splashing. These scenes are intended to enhance the combat atmosphere and the sense of tension in the game, but they may cause a certain impact on players with weaker psychological endurance. It is recommended that such players make a cautious choice when experiencing the game or play the game under the accompaniment of parents or guardians.

【Psychological and Emotional Hints】
The plot and character settings of the game involve some rather heavy and complex psychological and emotional themes, such as domestic violence, childhood trauma, and the struggle of human nature. These contents may trigger players' thinking about similar problems in real life, but they may also bring psychological burdens to some players. We hope that players can pay attention to their own emotional changes during the game process. If they feel uncomfortable, they can pause the game timely to adjust their mental state.
